[Index]

= Introduction =

This page assumes that the target PC has all dependencies installed.

All Neurospaces packages can be downloaded and installed by themselves, based on autotools ('./configure', 'make', 'sudo make install').

The most easy way to do the installation, is by using the package installer, see below.

= Details =

Using the install script of the InstallerPackage:

  * Install the common Neurospaces packages (at this moment, the model container, heccer, ssp and the studio), from downloads.sourceforge.net, distribution des-10 (*please, modify 'des-10' to be the latest release available for download, at present it is 'build-25'*):
{{{
neurospaces_build --download-server downloads.sourceforge.net --src-tag des-10 --src-dir /local_home/hugo/neurospaces_project/automated --regex 'heccer|ssp|studio|model-container' --verbose --verbose --verbose
}}}
    Add a couple of '--verbose' options to see what is going on.

To uninstall you can use the same command line, and use the '--uninstall' option:
{{{
neurospaces_build --download-server downloads.sourceforge.net --src-tag des-10 --src-dir /local_home/hugo/neurospaces_project/automated --regex 'heccer|ssp|studio|model-container' --verbose --verbose --verbose --uninstall --no-configure --no-compile --no-install
}}}
